templates.name: Can I post or sell your movies online?
templates.content: Movies purchased from us are intended for personal use only. They are not to be duplicated or uploaded as this is copyrighted material.

templates.name: Sales Collection
templates.content: You can take a look at our sale collection here: https://www.moviesunlimited.com/deals

templates.name: Wholesale inquiries
templates.content: Thank you for your interest! The best way to discuss wholesale is to contact us via this link: https://www.moviesunlimited.com/catalog/contactusform Our team is happy to chat.

templates.name: When do I get charged for a pre-order item?
templates.content:
If you pre-order an item, your credit card will be charged at the time
the product is shipped.

templates.name: Aside from the latest Hollywood releases, what else can be found at MOVIES UNLIMITED?
templates.content: We showcase exciting "B" westerns, classic and not-so-classic sci-fi from the 1950s, rare sports highlights, thrilling movie serials, fascinating documentaries, enthralling gladiator sagas, fantastic family fare, vintage TV shows and much, much more. If it's on video, we have it!

templates.name: Pre-order items shipping/ delivery time?
templates.content: All pre-order items will list an expected shipping time frame and a release date. We'll ship it to you on the actual availability date. Therefore, your total time for delivery would be Total Time for Delivery = Time Until Availability Date + Delivery Time Frame (based on the shipping method chosen during the checkout process). Availability dates are supplied by the manufacturer or distributor of the product and are subject to change without notice. Once we learn about any changes to the availability date, we update the availability info on our site.

templates.name: What is special about the MOVIES UNLIMITED VIDEO CATALOG?
templates.content: Our catalog is recognized as the most comprehensive guide to home video available. It features over 800 pages of videos available through us, listing virtually every movie title available on video. It's a veritable encyclopedia of video, complete with rare artwork, insightful synopses and great prices.

templates.name: Does MOVIES UNLIMITED offer hard-to-find titles?
templates.content:
Not only do we offer hard-to-find titles, but we also specialize in them. Locating rare films that are impossible to find in local video stores or through other mail-order operations is one of the
things we're famous for.

templates.name: Social media
templates.content: Give us a follow on IG: https://www.instagram.com/movies_unlimited/ and FB here: https://www.facebook.com/MoviesUnlimited/

templates.name: Return policy
templates.content: You can check out our detailed return policy here: https://www.moviesunlimited.com/returns

templates.name: Phone support
templates.content: You can give us a call at +1 800-466-8437 or let me know if I can help via text, it may be faster.

templates.name: How can I find new video releases throughout the year?
templates.content: Once you purchase a video through us, you're put on our mailing list, and you'll receive our VideoFlash supplements and other mailings during the year. We also offer a service which updates you by e-mail on upcoming releases, price reductions and other interesting information about the video market. If you'd like updates through our e-flash service, please send an email to update@moviesunlimited.com.

templates.name: Free shipping
templates.content: We offer free shipping on domestic orders over $50. Maybe you can add something else to reach the minimum?

templates.name: Shipping time
templates.content: In-stock items are usually received in 5 to 10 business days. You can find more information about shipping and delivery here: https://www.moviesunlimited.com/shipping-delivery

templates.name: Customer support
templates.content: The best way to handle this is to email us directly at cusserv@moviesunlimited.com, or give us a call at +1 800-466-8437. Our team is happy to help!

templates.name: What countries do you ship to?
templates.content: For a variety of reasons, the list of countries that we ship to can change. Please check the ship to country list in the shopping cart to see if your country is listed.

templates.name: Store location
templates.content: We don't currently have a store but definitely keep an eye out!

templates.name: Cancel / edit order
templates.content: I can check if that's possible. What's the order number, email address, and the change you'd like to make?

templates.name: Military / first responder discount
templates.content: Thank you for your service! We don't have any specific discounts like that, but if it helps, you can check out our current deals here: https://www.moviesunlimited.com/deals

templates.name: Brand ambassador / sponsorship
templates.content: Thank you for your interest! The best way to discuss this is to contact us via this link: https://www.moviesunlimited.com/catalog/contactusform Our team is happy to chat.

templates.name: Do you buy DVD/Blu-ray movies?
templates.content: Unfortunately, we do not buy DVD/Blu-ray movies.
